name: Mistlock Sanctuary Passkey (2 Weeks)
description:
This strange asuran device provides temporary access to the Mistlock Sanctuary.
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Fractals of the Mists Entrance
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild-Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

name: Golden Zephyr Backpiece
description:

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.
